topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5584907063687272e50001de#post_5584907063687272e50001de
The good news here is that the biggest groundbreaking advances are happening in specialized computers to mimic brain cells, memristors, etc.  Traditional computers have all but stalled out advancement wise for intelligent AI.

To make it as succinct as possible:
Time to something like Data from Star Trek: 15-35 year ballpark
Time to something like Skynet or Hal9000: 100+ years
